subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine carried a perfect game into the sixth inning as the Mets beat Dontrelle Willis and the Marlins. Reggie Abercrombie led off the sixth with a double and broke up Glavine's bid for perfection.
snippet: Tom Glavine carried a perfect game into the sixth inning as the Mets beat Dontrelle Willis and the Marlins. Reggie Abercrombie led off the sixth with a double and broke up Glavine's bid for perfection.
